duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise, coach, develop, train, and evaluate staff in the Bureau’s Life and Health Forms section.
Review accident and sickness form submissions and provide support to staff with their assigned form reviews.
Coordinate and monitor workload, training staff, auditing staff form reviews, conducting performance evaluations, and preparing reports.
Provide comments and advice on policy implications and technical health insurance issues, and support related projects.
Communicate with regulators, industry personnel, and the public in response to information requests and reviews of staff decisions.
Maintain effective working relationships with SCC staff, industry personnel, and other state agencies.
Ensure compliance with Virginia Insurance and Administrative Codes and determine applicability to submitted form and rate filings.
Attend job-related training and obtain related certifications and designations.

education_certification.credential: Considerable professional experience with health insurance forms and products. A college degree is desirable, but not required.
